name: Cimaganda
overview: Cimaganda, situated in Italy, is characterized by its beautiful granite rock. This bouldering destination is popular for its scenic surroundings and diverse climbing features, including cracks and edges. Climbers flock to Cimaganda during the spring and fall when the weather is just right for a memorable bouldering experience.

Cimaganda, ubicado en Italia, se caracteriza por su hermosa roca de granito. Este destino de boulder es popular por su entorno escénico y diversas características de escalada, incluyendo fisuras y cantos. Los escaladores acuden a Cimaganda durante la primavera y el otoño cuando el clima es perfecto para una experiencia inolvidable de boulder.
